content.html: Mastodon vs Twitter is a great case study on why decentralization alone isn't enough. Architecture matters and centralized systems exist for a reason: 👋🏾performance. I got a feeling the community is going to figure this out, whether that's ActivityPub, or something else.
content.value:
Mastodon vs Twitter is a great case study on why decentralization alone isn't enough. Architecture matters and centralized systems exist for a reason: 👋🏾performance.

I got a feeling the community is going to figure this out, whether that's ActivityPub, or something else.
